main event: The wife of a professor at Washington State University spotted a spinning halo-shaped object in the sky near Pullman, Washington on 17 July 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed between 1430 and 1530, The object was shiny and white, The halo appeared to be rotating end over end, The sighting lasted about 5 minutes, The report corroborates with another sighting reported by three men on 12 July.
sighted object: halo-shaped object spinning end over end
witness description: wife of an associate professor of Anthropology
